title: aDiyArin iDar
sahitya:
aDiyArin iDar tIrum noDi nErattinil vaDivEl muruganin kaDaikkaN aruLAl


anupallavi

  paDi mIdinil eDutta piravi tanai aDuttu iDai viDAdu menmEl innaluTru varum


caraNam    varuttam ura manadai uruttum kavalaigaL varaiyillAdu perugi vadaittiDum pOdu 
karuttinai cendUr kandan kazhalaDiyil niruttiyavan tiru nAmattaik-karudum
